definition: Lhasa Shoton festival or yogurt banquet, from first of July of Tibetan calendar
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

Lhasa Shoton festival or yogurt banquet, from first of July of Tibetan calendar
to be at a loss for words/speechless

variant of 愣[leng4]/to look distracted/to stare blankly/distracted/blank
variant of 稜|棱, corner/square beam/edge/arris (curve formed by two surfaces meeting at an edge)/see 楞迦 Sri Lanka
to collect one's thoughts (after being surprised or shocked)/to snap out of it (after being lost in thought)
